synopsis.text:
March into the unseen world of Shuchiin Academy's student council as they step out of their formal roles and engage in a series of unconventional activities. From a post-swim shower mishap involving Kaguya Shinomiya and Chika Fujiwara to an unexpected discovery of a discarded adult magazine by Miyuki Shirogane and Yuu Ishigami, the council members find themselves in a whirlwind of eccentric situations.

In this OVA, witness three unique stories unfold, each offering a fresh perspective on the council members' personalities. In one tale, Yuu voices his discontent about fanservice in manga, while the girls enjoy a shower, accompanied by an unexpected guest, Ai. Meanwhile, Miyuki and Yuu stumble upon an abandoned adult magazine, sparking an amusing conversation.

Lastly, the council members engage in a fierce culinary competition to determine the ultimate fried rice master. With Chika acting as the referee, the contest proves to be a challenging task, leaving everyone in suspense for days.

This special release offers a delightful blend of humor, camaraderie, and friendly rivalry, showcasing the student council members as never seen before. Dive into this exclusive collection, featuring Kaguya-sama Darkness volumes 1 and 2, along with the enticing Kaguya-sama wa Tabesasetai, and explore the hidden sides of your favorite characters.
